basics.name: Maciej Płusa
basics.label: Tech Lead
basics.summary: A tech lead with over a decade of web development experience, driven by a passion for technology and innovation. I have been programming commercially since 2010, delivering high-quality software solutions and leading successful projects. My expertise includes creating scalable and user-friendly web applications using the latest industry standards. I excel in managing cross-functional teams, optimizing workflows, and fostering collaboration. My technical skills, combined with strong leadership and communication abilities, enable me to navigate complex challenges and deliver exceptional results. In my free time, I explore new technologies, drive my electric car, and enjoy mixology.
